meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by severe itching.
meanings.sent1: The prurigo on his arm made him scratch constantly.
meanings.sent2: She visited the dermatologist for her prurigo treatment.
meanings.sent3: The prurigo seemed to have a mind of its own, causing mischief.
meanings.sent4: The prurigo felt like tiny insects crawling under his skin.
meanings.sent5: The intense prurigo was like a relentless tickle that never stopped.

meanings.sent1: The prurigo on her back was red and inflamed.
meanings.sent2: He applied a soothing cream to calm the prurigo on his legs.
meanings.sent3: The prurigo eruption seemed to dance across her skin.
meanings.sent4: The prurigo erupted like a volcano of itchiness.
meanings.sent5: The persistent prurigo eruption was like a storm brewing on his skin.
